20101214020755.444|20101214020756.556|CCO|WAY.
20101214020756.556|20101214020757.667|CCO|>> Ifill: YOUR RESPONSE TO THE
20101214020757.667|20101214020758.778|CCO|SAME QUESTION.
20101214020758.778|20101214020759.889|CCO|HOW MUCH DOES IT WEAKEN THE
20101214020759.889|20101214020801.000|CCO|LAW?

20101214022117.667|20101214022119.333|CCO|CHAIN TOGETHER HUNDREDS OF
20101214022119.333|20101214022121.000|CCO|COMPUTERS THAT ALL REQUEST

20101214022719.000|20101214022720.000|CCO|>> Brown: THE REASON FOR BEING
20101214022720.000|20101214022721.000|CCO|FRIGHTENED.
20101214022721.000|20101214022722.429|CCO|WHAT DO YOU SEE?
20101214022722.429|20101214022723.857|CCO|>> WELL, THERE IS REASON FOR
20101214022723.857|20101214022725.286|CCO|BEING FRIGHTENED.
20101214022725.286|20101214022726.714|CCO|WE HAVE AN INSECURE SYSTEM
20101214022726.714|20101214022728.143|CCO|THAT WAS DESIGNED TO BE OPEN
20101214022728.143|20101214022729.571|CCO|NOT TO BE SECURE.
20101214022729.571|20101214022731.000|CCO|WE'RE EXPANDING THAT SYSTEM

20101214023419.000|20101214023421.000|CCO|DOLLAR PONZI SCHEME HE SET UP.
20101214023421.000|20101214023422.667|CCO|RAY SUAREZ HAS OUR UPDATE.
20101214023422.667|20101214023424.333|CCO|>> Suarez: THIS WEEKEND MARKED
20101214023424.333|20101214023426.000|CCO|TWO YEARS SINCE MADOFF WAS
20101214023426.000|20101214023427.667|CCO|ARRESTED AND THE WORLD LEARNED
20101214023427.667|20101214023429.333|CCO|OF HIS GRAND FRAUD, ONE THAT MAY
20101214023429.333|20101214023431.000|CCO|HAVE ULTIMATELY COST INVESTORS
20101214023431.000|20101214023433.000|CCO|MORE THAN $50 BILLION IN WEALTH.
20101214023433.000|20101214023435.000|CCO|IT TURNED OUT TO BE A WEEKEND OF
20101214023435.000|20101214023437.000|CCO|STUNNING NEWS.
20101214023437.000|20101214023439.000|CCO|ON SATURDAY, ONE OF MADOFF'S
20101214023439.000|20101214023441.000|CCO|SONS, MARK MADOFF, WHO WORKED
20101214023441.000|20101214023442.429|CCO|FOR HIS FATHER, WAS FOUND DEAD
20101214023442.429|20101214023443.857|CCO|AFTER HE HANGED HIMSELF.
20101214023443.857|20101214023445.286|CCO|SATURDAY WAS DEADLINE FOR
20101214023445.286|20101214023446.714|CCO|LAWSUITS TO RECOVER MONEY
20101214023446.714|20101214023448.143|CCO|SATURDAY WAS ALSO THE DEADLINE
20101214023448.143|20101214023449.571|CCO|FOR FILING CIVIL LAWSUITS, TO
20101214023449.571|20101214023451.000|CCO|RECOVER MONEY PAID OUT OVER THE
20101214023451.000|20101214023452.429|CCO|YEARS BY BERNIE MADOFF.
20101214023452.429|20101214023453.857|CCO|NEARLY A THOUSAND SUCH SUITS
20101214023453.857|20101214023455.286|CCO|HAVE BEEN FILED.
20101214023455.286|20101214023456.714|CCO|AND MARK MADOFF WAS ONE OF
20101214023456.714|20101214023458.143|CCO|SEVERAL FAMILY MEMBERS NAMED AS
20101214023458.143|20101214023459.571|CCO|A DEFENDANT IN THOSE SUITS,
20101214023459.571|20101214023501.000|CCO|WHICH ARE BEING BROUGHT THROUGH
20101214023501.000|20101214023502.667|CCO|THE COURT'S BANKRUPTCY TRUSTEE.

20101214024049.333|20101214024051.000|CCO|TOOK IT UP FOR THE FIRST TIME,
20101214024051.000|20101214024052.429|CCO|AN OPENING MOVE THAT COULD LEAD

20101214024055.286|20101214024056.714|CCO|THE WEEK.
20101214024056.714|20101214024058.143|CCO|THE $858 BILLION TAX CUT DEAL
20101214024058.143|20101214024059.571|CCO|BROKERED BY PRESIDENT OBAMA
20101214024059.571|20101214024101.000|CCO|AND CONGRESSIONAL REPUBLICANS
20101214024101.000|20101214024103.000|CCO|FACED A CRITICAL TEST VOTE
20101214024103.000|20101214024105.000|CCO|THIS AFTERNOON.
20101214024105.000|20101214024107.000|CCO|>> ON THIS VOTE, THE YEAHS ARE
20101214024107.000|20101214024109.000|CCO|83, THE NAYS ARE 15.
20101214024109.000|20101214024111.000|CCO|THREE FIFTHS OF THE SENATORS

20101214024115.000|20101214024117.000|CCO|MOTION IS IS AGREED TO.
20101214024117.000|20101214024119.000|CCO|>> Brown: THAT TALLY MEANT THE
20101214024119.000|20101214024121.000|CCO|BILL HAD CLEARED THE 60-VOTE

20101214024129.571|20101214024131.000|CCO|REPUBLICAN LEADER MITCH
20101214024131.000|20101214024132.429|CCO|McCONNELL URGED PASSAGE.
20101214024132.429|20101214024133.857|CCO|>> DEMOCRATS IN WASHINGTON
20101214024133.857|20101214024135.286|CCO|HAVE ARGUED THAT THE SOLUTION
20101214024135.286|20101214024136.714|CCO|TO OUR NATION'S ECONOMIC
